## PointF.IsEmpty property

Gets a value indicating whether this [`PointF`](../../pointf) is empty.

```csharp
public bool IsEmpty { get; }
```

### Property Value

True if both [`X`](../x) and [`Y`](../y) are 0; otherwise, false.
